title: 显卡在哪里？
author: 火焰人
txt_content:
Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

replies.author: koukoutang
replies.txt_content: 显卡在你主机里的主板上的显卡插槽里。。

replies.author: zzcat770
replies.txt_content: 去更新下驱动吧，不是没有显卡，而是现有的显卡驱动对OpenGL的支持不好，可能更新显卡驱动能解决问题
